decision_conditions: work in accordance with British Standard
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1, T18, T22, T25, T33, T41, T42 7 x London plane: remove or reduce any branches affected by Massaria disease up to 10cm in diameterT2 1 x Amelanchier: prune back from light to give clearance of up to 1mT3 1 x oak: crown lift to 3m, pruning small diameter (<5cm) branches onlyT5, T6, T8 3 x birch: remove congested, crossing, damaged and diseased branches throughout the crown as required to improve structureT11 1 x lime: crown reduce to previous, most recent reduction points, retaining shortened furnishing growth and at least 50% of fine branch structure for crown continuity.  Removal basal and trunk suckers to crown break. T17 1 x cherry: remove congested, crossing, damaged and diseased branches throughout the crown as required to improve structureT24 1 x cherry: remove congested, crossing, damaged and diseased branches throughout the crown as required to improve structureT35 1 x bay: trim to previous, most recent reduction points1 x variegated holly: trim to previous, most recent reduction pointsT44 1 x bay: trim to previous, most recent reduction pointsT47  1 x cherry: prune back from street light to give 1m clearance (small diameter branches only <5cm)
